DOC.brief_summary: A study compare clinical efficacy safety Levocetirizine vs. Desloratadine patient suffer Chronic Idiopathic Urticaria ( CIU ) measure mean pruritus severity score first week treatment
DOC.criteria: At visit 1 : Clinical history Chronic Idiopathic Urticaria period least 6 week last 3 month without identifiable cause At visit 2 ( baseline period least 3 day ) : patient adequate sign CIU , term symptoms severity . Any condition would interfere evaluation therapeutic response .
